entry.title: Microsoft Boosts AI Efficiency With a ‘Heavy Metal Quartet’ of Compilers
entry.summary: Microsoft's Rammer, Roller, Welder and Grinder promise to make AI developments faster, beter, and more powerful

entry.title: Story Protocol Launches IP Ownership Network with $54 Million in Funding
entry.summary: Andreessen Horowitz invested in a startup that uses blockchain tech to address problems heightened by artificial intelligence.

entry.title: Coinbase-Incubated Base Suffers Outage, Team Says 'No Funds Are at Risk'
entry.summary: The outage prompted dozens of comparisons to other blockchain solutions and their relative stability.

entry.title: Grayscale Prods SEC to Approve Bitcoin Spot ETF After Court Victory
entry.summary: Lawyers for the investment firm call out inconsistent treatment of Bitcoin trusts and futures in the protracted debate.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: MrBeast-Promoted 'Creator League' Postponed After Gamers Bail Amid NFT Backlash
entry.summary: Influencers in the gaming league say they were misled about the blockchain aspect. Now eFuse is pausing the program and laying off staff.

entry.title: How Mino Games is Using Artificial Intelligence
entry.summary: Mino Games CEO Sasha McKinnon tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the studio's upcoming game Dimensionals will use real-time AI.

entry.title: MetaMask Introduces Bank and PayPal Cash-Out Options
entry.summary: "Ensuring a way for users to enter and exit crypto freely is important," the company said.

entry.title: Gitcoin Co-Founder Kevin Owocki Says His Return Won't Make Him Center of the Network
entry.summary: “To be clear, I’m not dictating. I’m bottoms-up gathering intelligence and helping them synthesize their roadmap together," he told Decrypt.

entry.title: Bored Ape Creator Giving Away Bitcoin in Ordinals Puzzle Game
entry.summary: Yuga Labs has launched a 13-week puzzle-solving competition around its TwelveFold Ordinals, with Bitcoin prizes available for players.

entry.title: Epic Games Embraces AI In Games, In Break With Steam
entry.summary: The two leading online game stores are split over artificial intelligence, setting the stage for a showdown.

entry.title: Visa Promises Faster Credit Card Payments With USDC on Solana
entry.summary: The payments giant doesn’t seem to be slowing down with its crypto ambitions.

entry.title: 'Pixel Pioneer': Christie's to Auction Keith Haring Digital Art as NFTs
entry.summary: Keith Haring's 1987 artwork created on a Commodore Amiga has been minted on Ethereum and will be auctioned by Christie's.

entry.title: Watch-and-Earn Platform Myco Reveals Community Film Funding Program
entry.summary: The Mycolab program will provide 65% of the funding for selected film projects that can raise the first 35% from the community.

entry.title: Future Ethereum Upgrades Could Allow Full Nodes to Run on Mobile Phones: Vitalik Buterin
entry.summary: Planned Ethereum upgrades including stateless clients will help to decentralize the network, said its co-founder at Korea Blockchain Week.

entry.title: Sorare Launches AR-Equipped 3D Digital Football Player Cards
entry.summary: The launch of Sorare's upgraded collectibles comes alongside a global scavenger hunt offering the winner a “once-in-a-lifetime” trip.

entry.title: South Korean Banking Giant Partners With BitGo, Opens Doors To Crypto
entry.summary: KEB Hana Bank’s partnership with the crypto custodian ties one of the largest financial groups in the country to the digital asset space.

entry.title: ECB Exec Takes Aim At PayPal's Stablecoin, Praises Digital Euro
entry.summary: European Central Bank executive Fabio Panetta warned of the risks associated with private stablecoins, while making the case for CBDCs.

entry.title: Casio Dropping Free NFTs to 'Co-Create' Virtual G-Shock Watches
entry.summary: The G-Shock watch brand is coming to the metaverse via Polygon NFTs—and Casio wants to cultivate a community of collaborators.

entry.title: OpenAI Plugs ChatGPT Into Canva to Sharpen Its Competitive Edge in AI
entry.summary: Now ChatGPT Plus users can "talk" to Canva directly from OpenAI's bot, making their workflow easier.

entry.title: Solana Is the ‘Most Loved Altcoin Among investors’, Says CoinShares
entry.summary: Investors have been withdrawing from altcoin crypto funds, but Solana is an exception.

entry.title: Crypto Market Might Look Calm, But It’s ‘Swimming Like Mad’ Beneath the Surface: Analyst
entry.summary: The week was marked by a mere $11.2 million in outflows—but the real news was $2.8 billion in trading volume.

entry.title: ‘Crypto Can Be the Gateway to Better Financial Literacy’ Say University Researchers
entry.summary: Academics from the University of Cincinnati have created a Crypto Literacy Scale to better gauge investors' education levels.

entry.title: Drake-Backed Crypto Casino Stake Loses $40M in 'Unauthorized' Transfers
entry.summary: Crypto funds were drained from a wallet belonging to the gambling platform in an apparent hack. The company insists customer funds are safe.

entry.title: Binance Head of Product Is Latest Exec to Depart Crypto Exchange
entry.summary: Mayur Kamat’s resignation is the latest in a series of executive departures from Binance, as the exchange faces regulatory headwinds.

entry.title: The Indie Film Studio Pioneering AI-Powered 'Synth-Assisted Production'
entry.summary: Pigeon Shrine is using artificial intelligence to create jobs in the film industry, claims the firm's founder and CEO.

entry.title: Gala Games Co-Founders Sue Each Other Alleging Corporate Waste, $130 Million Theft
entry.summary: The co-founders of Gala Games are at loggerheads, with rival lawsuits accusing each other of theft or corporate waste that cost the company a nine-digit sum.

entry.title: London Stock Exchange Group Plans Blockchain-Powered Digital Markets Business
entry.summary: The global financial markets infrastructure and data provider is planning an “end-to-end digital market ecosystem” powered by blockchain.

entry.title: XLM Surges 10% As Stellar Teases 'Something Cool' on the Horizon
entry.summary: The price of Stellar (XLM) skyrocketed 10% over the past day, while the wider crypto market is trading flat.

entry.title: Vitalik Buterin Sells MKR Tokens as MakerDAO Co-Founder Pushes for Solana-based ‘NewChain’
entry.summary: The Ethereum co-founder sold $580,000 in MakerDAO’s MKR tokens, as the stablecoin platform plans a new Solana-based appchain.

entry.title: Lido Dominance Prompts Warnings About Liquid Staking Derivatives
entry.summary: Community members are warning that the staking protocol is at risk of becoming too centralized, and could undermine Ethereum as a whole.

entry.title: Binance Is 'Way Ahead of the Game' on US Regulations, Says CZ
entry.summary: CZ struck out against what he said was the FUD aimed at his company amid heightened regulatory scrutiny in recent months.

entry.title: ‘Ethereum Is Awesome', Says Solana Co-Founder Amid Planned MakerDAO Migration
entry.summary: MakerDAO’s co-founder Rune Christensen has said that Solana is a “better fit” as the basis for MakerDAO's new blockchain.

entry.title: The Best Ways to Run Stable Diffusion and SDXL on an Apple Silicon Mac
entry.summary: The go-to image generator for AI art enthusiasts can be installed on Apple's latest hardware.

entry.title: SEC Charges Hawaii Man for Fake Crypto Pump-and-Dump Scheme
entry.summary: The alleged scammer told unwitting investors that he planned to convert securities into cryptocurrency as part of his ruse.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Grayscale Wins Against SEC, SEC Delays ETF Applications
entry.summary: A Federal court dealt a major blow to the SEC, which subsequently pushed back its decision on six Bitcoin ETF applications.

entry.title: Fine Dining and Digital Art: Trevor Jones' Castle Party Returns
entry.summary: A who's who of the digital art world will gather just outside of Paris for a weekend to celebrate what Jones calls a "grand party."

entry.title: This Startup Wants to Use AI to Improve Your Morning Commute
entry.summary: Following a successful $140 million Series C fundraise, Oxa is set to debut its driverless shuttles in Florida.

entry.title: Half of the People in Turkey Now Own Crypto: Report
entry.summary: KuCoin says crypto adoption is high in Turkey, as observed in other nations struggling with rapid inflation.

entry.title: Here Are The AI Celebrities You Can Date Right Now
entry.summary: The modern twist on the 900 numbers of the past, AI chatbots provide interactive conversations.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Unmoved in Slow Market Week
entry.summary: Also, the SEC was ordered to review its denial of crypto asset manager Grayscale’s ETF proposal.

entry.title: INTERVIEW: How Will Aurory Use NFTs and Crypto?
entry.summary: Michael Natoli, Aurory's Head of Marketing and Business Development, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Aurory games will use NFTs and crypto and shares the studio's broader stance on the tech.

entry.title: Google Cloud's James Tromans on the Intersection of AI and Web3
entry.summary: Google's Global Head of Google Cloud for Web3 James Tromans sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson to discuss how AI can help Web3 companies come to market faster and the real value of Web3 tools.

entry.title: Mastering NFT Trading - Degen U
entry.summary: Take Degen U's new course, Mastering NFT Trading, and earn an on-chain certificate. A top instructor will help you identify trends, seize the right moment to trade, weed out scams—and have fun while doing it!

entry.title: Space Nation CEO on Working With 'Independence Day' Director Roland Emmerich
entry.summary: Jerome Wu, CEO of Space Nation, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the upcoming Space Nation Online game in development and shares details on Space Nation Cofounder Roland Emmerich's role in the project.

entry.title: GAME REVIEW: Champions Arena from Gala Games
entry.summary: Champions Arena is a turn-based fantasy RPG from Gala Games, where characters can become NFTs and crypto can be used to purchase gems, one of the game's synthetic currencies. Decrypt's Kate Irwin takes us inside the game for her thoughts on the fun, mobile-first title.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor Ben Prendergast on the Future of Gaming
entry.summary: Voice actor Ben Prendergast, who's voiced characters in games like Apex Legends and God of War Ragnarok, shares his opinions on the tech space's history of "bubbles" and whether blockchain gaming has a future.

entry.title: The future of AI Stardom and Robotics with SingularityNET COO Janet Adams and Desdemona
entry.summary: In this interview, SingularityNET COO Janet Adams explains the intricate details that went into creating the Desdemona robot AI from Hanson Robotics and future plans for the AI Diva.

entry.title: Crypto a 'No-Brainer' for Video Games, Says Mino Games CEO
entry.summary: Mino Games CEO Sasha MacKinnon, developer of the upcoming Dimensionals game, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the studio's approach to digital collectibles.

entry.title: Michael Wagner's 'Controversial Take' on Crypto in Games
entry.summary: At Solana's PlayGG, Star Atlas CEO Michael Wagner shares his "controversial take" on crypto in games, shares the challenges of developing the upcoming scifi game, and how crypto's volatility has changed his perspective with Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: Interview: Angelic CEO on Building the Sci-Fi RPG on Solana and Ethereum
entry.summary: Angelic is a sci-fi roleplay game in development that will be free-to-play and offer optional, opt-in crypto features on Solana and Ethereum and a governance token. Metaverse Game Studios CEO and Founder Erkan Bayol tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he sees AAA traditional games as Angelic's main competitors and shares his vision for the game.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor on AI's Impact on Video Games
entry.summary: Ben Prendergast is an actor who has voiced characters like Apex Legends' Fuse, God of War Ragnarok's Tyr, and Patroclus in Hades. But as debates swirl around the use of artificial intelligence in entertainment in light of the SAG-AFTRA and WGA strikes, Prendergast gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin his honest take on the potential use of AI actors in games.

entry.title: Star Atlas CEO on Developing an MMO Game
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson speaks with Star Atlas Founder and CEO Michael Wagner about the MMO game's approach to development, marketing, and blockchain integrations.

entry.title: Aurory's Origin Story: How JRPGs Inspired the Games
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson talks to Aurory's Head of Marketing and Business Development Michael Natoli about the origins of the Aurory crypto games at the Solana PlayGG event.

entry.title: Parallel TCG: Inside the Sci-Fi Card Game’s Closed Beta
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes hands-on with Parallel’s closed beta on Windows PC to find out what sets it apart from other crypto card-battlers.

entry.title: Web3 Games Need to Compete with All Games, Says Solana Foundation GM
entry.summary: Solana Foundation's General Manager of Games Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Solana's PlayGG conference and shares his take on crypto gaming and the "play-to-earn" concept.
